summary: Program Analyst with experience in stakeholder relations, policy analysis, and external affairs for the USDA Food and Nutrition Service. Skilled in partnership development, webinars, data analysis, GIS, and communications strategy to engage diverse stakeholders and advance nutrition programs.

experience.title: Program Analyst
experience.description: Assisted in meeting strategic priorities for the USDA Food Waste Challenge Initiative by creating resources and presentations to promote the program and increase school involvement; organized presentations for the National Green Schools Conference; managed external communications from the general public, schools, and partners; managed the Team Nutrition and the Healthier US School Challenge database.

experience.title: Program Analyst
experience.company: The Office of External and Governmental Affairs
experience.description: Identified and developed over 30 new & existing national partnerships among stakeholders aligned with FNS strategic goals; served as liaison between FNS and partners; developed comprehensive work plans, event itineraries, presentations, reports, and portfolio evaluation; disseminated information through detailed written correspondence, press releases, conference calls, and in-person meetings; edited and finalized reports on expansion and growth of FNS programs; led planning for over 400 webinars; performed quantitative analyses to measure efficiency; gathered best practices from partners nationwide; analyzed GIS mapping to increase anti-hunger outreach; led pilot projects in rural underserved communities; represented FNS at advisory boards and conferences; participated in internal/external review boards; contributed to USDA FNS Agency Priority Working Group; advanced priorities such as SNAP-authorized farmers' markets expansion and education initiatives.

experience.title: Student Intern
experience.description: Part-time volunteer employment - 20 hours per week. Supervisor: Jeff Greenfield.

education.degree: Master of Public Health, Health Education
Bachelor of Science: Community Health Nutrition
